section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I also have the disposition to announce in number 72-1557, Speight against Slaton.

For reasons stated in an opinion filed this morning, the judgment on the review is vacated and remanded to the District Court for reconsideration in the light of the decision of the Georgia Supreme Court in intervening decision in Sanders against State of Georgia.
